biotools.summary: PremPLI predicts the effects of single mutations on protein-ligand interactions by calculating the binding affinity changes quantitatively. It can be used for guiding the design of ligand-binding proteins, identifying and understanding disease driver mutations, and finding potential resistance mutations for different drugs. The 3D structure of a protein-ligand complex is required for performing the prediction.
